Package net.conquiris.schema

Interface Summary
BinarySchemaItem Marker interface for binary items.
BooleanSchemaItem Marker interface for boolean schema items.
ByteStringSchemaItem Marker interface for byte string schema items.
DoubleSchemaItem Marker interface for double schema items.
FieldNameProperty Required field name property.
FloatSchemaItem Marker interface for float schema items.
InstantSchemaItem Marker interface for instant schema items.
IntegerSchemaItem Marker interface for integer schema items.
IsIndexedFlag Field is indexed flag.
IsStoredFlag Field is stored flag.
LongSchemaItem Marker interface for long schema items.
NumericSchemaItem<T extends Number> Marker interface for numeric schema items.
Schema Conquiris Lucene document schema definition interface.
SchemaItem Conquiris Lucene document schema item base interface.
StreamSchemaItem Marker interface for streamed textual schema items.
TextSchemaItem Marker interface for textual schema items.
UUIDSchemaItem Marker interface for UUID schema items.
 

Class Summary
AbstractWithFieldNameProperty Base class for object with the field name property.
SchemaItems Schema items factory methods.
Schemas Schema factory methods.
